definitions.definition: A period of time when a person occupies a position only conditionally and may be removed if certain conditions are not met.
examples: You'll be on probation for first six months. After that, if you work out, they'll hire you permanently.

definitions.definition: A type of sentence where convicted criminals are permitted to continue living in a community but will automatically be sent to jail if they violate certain conditions .
examples: He got two years probation for robbery.

main_definition: A period of time when a person occupies a position only conditionally and may be removed if certain conditions are not met.
secondary_definitions: ( law ) A type of sentence where convicted criminals are permitted to continue living in a community but will automatically be sent to jail if they violate certain conditions .
( archaic ) The act of testing ; proof .
